attributes.additional_details: Because people may not see it but having a cat can help with your mental health and losing a cat can hurt just as much as loosing a loved friend or family member
attributes.background: I want you to make it a legal requirement for people to stop when a colison has happened involving a cat and make it a legal requirement to report it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622511
